items.title: Apple is richer than ever thanks to high margins—and its new CFO intends to keep it that way
items.description: Kevan Parekh is set on maintaining the company's "disciplined pricing strategy."

items.title: Danish wind giant Orsted replaces its CEO with shares down 83% and Trump pressures looming
items.description: Orsted was in the fossil fuels business as "Danish Oil and Natural Gas" for much of its lifetime. It's renewable energy pivot is hurting in the U.S. n...

items.title: iPhone sales slump in China as Apple falters in key market
items.description: The company's overall sales in China declined 11.1% during the quarter to $18.51 billion.

items.title: Inside Errol Musk’s foray into the volatile world of memecoins
items.description: Why Elon Musk’s dad decided to endorse a cryptocurrency.

items.title: Meta said it would fire staff who leaked company intel. Then that memo got leaked
items.description: Mark Zuckerberg bemoaned the fact his meetings and memos kept being leaked to the press, so Meta pledged to buckle down on staff.
